ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
ISNEW() && CONTAINS( RecordType.Name ,'Staff') && ( NOT( REGEX( FirstName, '([A-Z]*[a-z]*[A-Z]*[a-z]*)([\\s\\\'-][A-Z]*[a-z]*[A-Z]*[a-z]*)*' ))
||
NOT( REGEX( LastName, '([A-Z]*[a-z]*[A-Z]*[a-z]*)([\\s\\\'-][A-Z]*[a-z]*[A-Z]*[a-z]*)*' )))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The Account name must not contains any number or special character
